00025 template <class ModelInterface>
00026 class TSingleModelObserverBase: public CSingleModelObserverBase
00027 {
00028 public:
00029        typedef CSingleModelObserverBase BaseClass;
00030        typedef ModelInterface ModelType;
00031 
00032        TSingleModelObserverBase();
00033 
00034        ModelInterface* GetObjectPtr() const;
00035 
00039        bool AttachOrSetObject(ModelInterface* objectPtr);
00040 
00041        // reimplemented (imod::IObserver)
00042        virtual bool OnAttached(imod::IModel* modelPtr);
00043        virtual bool OnDetached(imod::IModel* modelPtr);
00044

00046        virtual ModelInterface* CastFromModel(imod::IModel* modelPtr) const;

00055 template <class ModelInterface>
00056 TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::TSingleModelObserverBase()
00057 {
00058        m_objectPtr = NULL;
00059 }
00060 
00061 
00062 template <class ModelInterface>
00063 ModelInterface* TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::GetObjectPtr() const
00064 {
00065        return m_objectPtr;
00066 }

00068 
00069 template <class ModelInterface>
00070 bool TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::AttachOrSetObject(ModelInterface* objectPtr)
00071 {
00072        EnsureModelDetached();
00073 
00074        imod::IModel* modelPtr = dynamic_cast<imod::IModel*>(objectPtr);
00075 
00076        bool retVal = false;
00077        if ((modelPtr != NULL) && modelPtr->AttachObserver(this)){
00078               retVal = true;
00079        }
00080 
00081        m_objectPtr = objectPtr;
00082 
00083        return retVal;
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00087 // reimplemented (imod::IObserver)
00088 
00089 template <class ModelInterface>
00090 bool TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::OnAttached(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
00091 {
00092        m_objectPtr = CastFromModel(modelPtr);
00093 
00094        I_IF_DEBUG(
00095               if (m_objectPtr == NULL){
00096                      QString exptectedObjectInterface = typeid(ModelInterface).name();
00097 
00098                      QString debugMessage = QString("Data model interface is not supported by this observer. Expected interface is: %1").arg(exptectedObjectInterface);
00099 
00100                      qDebug(debugMessage.toUtf8());
00101               }
00102        )
00103 
00104        if ((m_objectPtr != NULL) && BaseClass::OnAttached(modelPtr)){
00105               return true;
00106        }
00107 
00108        BaseClass::EnsureModelDetached();
00109 
00110        return false;
00111 }
00112 
00113 
00114 template <class ModelInterface>
00115 bool TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::OnDetached(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
00116 {
00117        if (BaseClass::OnDetached(modelPtr)){
00118               // If model was correctly attached m_objectPtr cannot be NULL. OnDetach returns true only if model was correctly attached.
00119               Q_ASSERT(m_objectPtr != NULL);
00120 
00121               m_objectPtr = NULL;
00122 
00123               return true;
00124        }
00125 
00126        return false;
00127 }

00134 {
00135        return dynamic_cast<ModelInterface*>(modelPtr);
00136 }
